item.title: Certificates
item.description: Connect to Remote Server with SSL/TLS linkYou need to have two files - certificate and private key. nc --ssl-cert cert.pem --ssl-key private-key.pem <target-ip> <target-port> # or ncat --ssl-cert cert.pem --ssl-key private-key.pem <target-ip> <target-port> RSA Attack link Retrieve Private Key RsaCtfTool RSA attack tool (mainly for ctf) - retreive private key from weak public key and/or uncipher data. PFX (PKCS#12) -> PEM -> RSA link Crack Password of PFX crackpkcs12 is useful to crack password.
